content: Do we want the Containerization Working Group to have any presence at the 2026 community meeting in Barcelona? A 15 minute talk? A poster? An in-person meeting? Stickers? :stuck_out_tongue_wink:

image.png
I vote for handing out these :rolling_on_the_floor_laughing:

@Oliver Bertuch @Don Sizemore @BalÃ¡zs Pataki @Kris Dekeyser (KU Leuven) should we have an in-person Containerization working group meeting in Barcelona? This would be on the pre-conference day (Tuesday, May 12th) and held at the Barcelona Supercomputing Center rather than the main conference venue, the World Trade Center. See also this reply by Felipe GÃ³mez-CortÃ©s: #community > #Dataverse2026 @ ðŸ’¬
I am submitting our abstract hopefully today, and optimistically saying that I'll be there in person and would love a containerization WG meeting!
